event.title: the best use for the building, and in 2003

data.event: In 2002, a feasibility study was done to determine the best use for the building, and in 2003 the association decided to use the building for the arts.
The first two classrooms opened for use in 2004.
Lee Academy serves about 300 students a year and teachers are both paid and volunteer.
